--- create_remote_function.sql
CREATE FUNCTION remote_func(x INT64) RETURNS INT64 REMOTE OPTIONS (endpoint = "https://example.com")
--- AST
&ast.CreateFunction{
  As:       -1,
  RparenAs: -1,
  Name:     &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 16,
        NameEnd: 27,
        Name:    "remote_func",
      },
    },
  },
  Params: []*ast.FunctionParam{
    &ast.FunctionParam{
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 28,
        NameEnd: 29,
        Name:    "x",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 30,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
    },
  },
  ReturnType: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
    NamePos: 45,
    Name:    "INT64",
  },
  Remote:  true,
  Options: &ast.Options{
    Options: 58,
    Rparen:  99,
    Records: []*ast.OptionsDef{
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 67,
          NameEnd: 75,
          Name:    "endpoint",
        },
        Value: &ast.StringLiteral{
          ValuePos: 78,
          ValueEnd: 99,
          Value:    "https://example.com",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE FUNCTION remote_func (x INT64) RETURNS INT64 REMOTE OPTIONS (endpoint = "https://example.com")
